title: 2010 Winter Olympics medal table
summary: The 2010 Winter Olympics, officially known as the XXI Olympic Winter Games, was a    winter multi-sport event held in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, from February 12 to February 28. A total of 2,632 athletes (+124 from 2006 Olympics) representing 82 National Olympic Committees (NOCs) (+2 from 2006) participated in 86 events (+2 from 2006) from 15 different sports and disciplines (unchanged from 2006).[1]
